wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Findlay Lindsay (8 November 1896 – 9 December 1971) was a professional footballer who played for Raith Rovers, Tottenham Hotspur, Thames and Dundee.

response: Alexander or Alex Lindsay may refer to:
*Alex Lindsay (violinist) (1919–1974), New Zealand violinist, conductor and orchestra leader
*Alex Lindsay (podcaster) (born 1970), founder of the Pixel Corps
